projects.title: A Distributed IoT Platform
projects.description: A distributed platform to host IoT applications developed by independen developers.

projects.title: A SDN based Network Packet Sniffer
projects.description: A tool that leverages the concepts of Software Defined Networking to capture packets in the network for further analysis by the network administrator.

projects.title: A Peer-to-Peer File Sharing System
projects.description: A set of Linux based command line systems to enable sharing of files between peers in absence of a central server.

projects.title: Virtual R&D Showcase
projects.description: A virtual reality web app for showcasing R&D posters.

projects.title: Keyword extraction from text
projects.description: A program to extract keyword from given text.
